name: 宇宙中的生命與太空環境
goals: The conditions for the life, and therefore the significance and fragility of our existence in the space and time can be only proved by investigating the alien world.
Those knowledge and questions will not only broaden our knowledge about extraterrestrial world, but more importantly, our knowledge about ourselves.
To research the life in the Universe will also have a deep impact on students’ knowledge and attitude towards the future technology and environmental problems on Earth, as well.
syllabus:
**Weekly topics**

1.  課程介紹：尋找地外生命的科學證據 overview
2.  地球外的生命在哪? -- 宇宙中生命的興亡 life in the universe -- creation and destroy
3.  從夜空到宇宙的結構 universe and night sky
4.  地球生命源自外太空嗎 origin of life on earth
5.  地球與太陽系的形成 planet formation
6.  太陽系中的生命life in the solar system -- planets, moons, and small bodies
7.  探索太空環境的歷程與策略 space exploration
8.  Midterm exam 期中考
9.  第二個地球在哪 / 系外行星exoplanets
10.  沙漠中的綠洲 - 適居環境 habitable zones around the sun and other stars
11.  銀河系中的生命徵兆 detecting signals of life in the milky way
12.  黑洞與生命的關聯 black holes, supernovae and life
13.  地外文明：宇宙中有其他的有智生命嗎 Intelligent life in the universe
14.  與外星人接觸 SETI and communication with aliens
15.  世界末日與地球生命的滅絕 the end of the world
16.  Final exam 期末考
17.  Presentations / term essay \* 期末報告
18.  Presentations / term essay 期末報告

grading.note: 期中考 + 期末考 +（書面╱口頭）報告 + 作業 + 課堂參與及討論
